Detailed Description

Adds file and project history support to wxExManagedFrame.

It also updates the title of the frame if you have a focused STC file or listview project. Finally it adds process support and find in files dialog.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxExFrameWithHistory::wxExFrameWithHistory ( wxWindow *  parent,
wxWindowID  id,
const wxString &  title,
size_t  maxFiles = 9,
size_t  maxProjects = 0,
int  style = wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE 
)

Constructor.

Default it gives file history support to be used from the file menu. So you should call UseFileHistory somewhere to set it up. Default it does not use a recent project file.
